WorkItem.Description:
Properties that are generated for attributes of elements are not using the global keyword. So if you have a element named System, there will be a class named System. The code will not complie becuse it looking for the type String in System class not in the System namepace.
 
[global::System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty(................
 public System.String AllGroups
 {
   get
 
 
 
The code that is genrated dost not use global:: for return types. So if you have a element named System then code will not compile becuse it will try to use the type <ConfigName>.System.String when it should be using global::System.String.
WorkItem.Summary: global:: missing on basic types for attributes
